borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of a Sustainable Urban Drainage System (SUDS), including maintenance programme, pursuant to Condition 11; details of a maintenance programme for all sustainable drainage systems, including timeframes for the planned maintenance measures and confirmation of the maintenance provider, pursuant to Condition 12; details of a noise assessment, pursuant to Condition 14; details of the external sound level emitted from plant/ machinery/ equipment and mitigation measures as appropriate, pursuant to Condition 15; details of anti-vibration measures, pursuant to Condition 16; details of the installation, operation, and maintenance of the odour abatement equipment and extract system, pursuant to Condtion 17; details of external artificial lighting, pursuant to Condition 18; details of a report including detailed information on the proposed mechanical ventilation system with NOx filtration, pursuant to Condition 27; details of the Ultra Low NOx Gas fired boilers to be provided for space heating and domestic hot water, pursuant to Condition 28; details of the hard landscaping and soft landscaping of all areas external to the building, including paving, and detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20, pursuant to Condition 30; details of a statement of how 'Secured by Design' requirements, pursuant to Condition 35 of planning permission reference: 2018/00202/FUL dated 4th September 2018.
